name: Chickpea Sweet Potato Peanut Burgers
description: These Sweet Potato chickpea Peanut Burgers have an asian twist to them. Served with Almond Sriracha Sauce (use Peanut butter or seed butter for variations) Free of Dairy, egg, corn. Can be made soy-free, gluten-free. Makes 6 to 8 patties
recipeIngredient: 1 15 oz can chickpeas (drained or 1.5 cups cooked chickpeas)
1 tsp soy sauce  (or use coconut aminos to make soy-free)
2 Tbsp flax seed meal  (or chia seeds)
1/2 cup sweet potato puree or mash
Oat flour or chickpea flour  (or breadcrumbs as needed)
Almond Sriracha Sauce (use Peanut butter or seed butter for variations)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200ºc. Process peanuts, oats, garlic ginger in a processor. Add chickpeas, cilantro and blend. Transfer to a bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200ºc. Process peanuts, oats, garlic ginger in a processor. Add chickpeas, cilantro and blend. Transfer to a bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add everything from soy sauce through sweet potato puree/mash. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add everything from soy sauce through sweet potato puree/mash. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add ground oats or chickpea flour to help reduce moisture in the mixture. Shape using greased hands or shape through a cookie cutter. Place on parchment lined baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ground oats or chickpea flour to help reduce moisture in the mixture. Shape using greased hands or shape through a cookie cutter. Place on parchment lined baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at pre-heated 400 degrees F / 200ºc for 20 minutes. Flip and bake for another 5 to 10 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at pre-heated 400 degrees F / 200ºc for 20 minutes. Flip and bake for another 5 to 10 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the almond Sriracha sauce. Layer kale/greens/lettuce, tomato, burger patty, almond sriracha sauce, cilantro and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the almond Sriracha sauce. Layer kale/greens/lettuce, tomato, burger patty, almond sriracha sauce, cilantro and serve.
